resources.string:
Hello 🖐️ friends, Welcome to My GitHub. 💕 I am Riyad Mahmud and I tried most fields of programming and Sector such as
🔰Mobile Application Development, 🔰 Flutter Framework Dart Programming 🔰Web Design and Development, 🔰 Graphic Design 🔰 WordPress Development, 🔰 Cybersecurity Ethical Hacking ,etc.
❇️Finally I was able to find my interest, and that was Mobile Application Design and Development .
🖥️It has been almost 2 years ,I am coding.
🎓 I am a Computer Science Engineering Student and also Graduate from American International University Bangladesh (AIUB)
💫Now I working Profeessionally as a Junior Mobile Application developer
✈️ I love to explore new places and love to travel a lot.
